headline.main: CONNALLY TO ASK WAR ZONE REPEAL; Plans Move to Let Our Ships Go to Britain After Senate Acts on Arming Vessels COMMITTEE SPLIT IS SEEN Poll Indicates a Deadlock on Issue of Outright Repeal for Whole Neutrality Act

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 19 -- An informal poll indicated tonight that Administration leaders in the Senate have enough support to secure passage of the ship-arming resolution within ten days but cannot get enough votes in the Senate Foreign Relations Committee for outright repeal of the Neutrality Act.
abstract: Connally to ask zone repeal after Sen acts on ship arming; informal com poll indicates deadlock on planned Pepper motion to repeal act; Connally replies to Wheeler's war rider threat; Wheeler comments; Sen leaders may consult Roosevelt on act repeal
